TalentsTiers.Name: Armored to the Teeth
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your attack power by [@value] for every 108 armor value you have.

TalentsTiers.Name: Booming Voice
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout, and Commanding Shout by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Cruelty
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Unbridled Wrath
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a chance to generate an additional rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.[@value]
PointValues: Effect occurs more often than Unbridled Wrath (Rank 1).
Effect occurs more often than Unbridled Wrath (Rank 2).
Effect occurs more often than Unbridled Wrath (Rank 3).
Effect occurs more often than Unbridled Wrath (Rank 4).

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Cleave
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Piercing Howl
TalentsTiers.Description:
10 Rage
Instant
Causes all enemies within 10 yards to be Dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

TalentsTiers.Name: Blood Craze
TalentsTiers.Description: Regenerates [@value]% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.

TalentsTiers.Name: Commanding Presence
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout and the health bonus of your Commanding Shout by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Dual Wield Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Execute
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the rage cost of your Execute ability by [@value].

TalentsTiers.Name: Enrage
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a 30% chance to receive a [@value]% damage bonus for 12 sec after being the victim of a damaging attack. This effect does not stack with Wrecking Crew.

TalentsTiers.Name: Precision
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Death Wish
TalentsTiers.Description:
10 Rage
Instant
3 min cooldown

When activated you become enraged, increasing your physical damage by 20% but increasing all damage taken by 5%. Lasts 30 sec. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Intercept
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Berserker Rage
TalentsTiers.Description: The Berserker Rage ability will generate [@value] rage when used. Increases the duration of Berserker Rage by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Flurry
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your armor penetration by [@value]% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

TalentsTiers.Name: Intensify Rage
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Bloodrage, Berserker Rage, Recklessness and Death Wish abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Bloodthirst
TalentsTiers.Description:
20 Rage
Melee Range

Instant
4 sec cooldown

Instantly attack the target causing 260 damage. In addition, the next 3 successful melee attacks will restore 1% of max health. This effect lasts 8 sec. Damage is based on your attack power.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Whirlwind
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of your Whirlwind ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Furious Attacks
TalentsTiers.Description: Your normal melee attacks have a chance to reduce all healing done to the target by [@value]% for 10 sec. This can stack up to 2 times.[@value2]
PointValues2: This occurs more often than Furious Attacks (Rank 1).

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Berserker Stance
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases attack power by [@value]% and reduces threat caused by [@value2]% while in Berserker Stance.

TalentsTiers.Name: Heroic Fury
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
45 sec cooldown

Removes any Immobilization effects and refreshes the cooldown of your Intercept ability.

TalentsTiers.Name: Rampage
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases ranged and melee criticalhit chance of all party and raid members within 100 yds by 5%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Bloodsurge
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Heroic Strike, Bloodthirst and Whirlwind hits have a [@value]% chance of making your next Slam instant for 5 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Unending Fury
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Slam, Whirlwind and Bloodthirst abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Titans Grip
TalentsTiers.Description: Allows you to equip two-handed axes, maces and swords in one hand. While you have aTwo-Handed weapon equipped in one hand. All damage done is reduced by 15%.
